nodes.bodyText: @olenagerasimova you should pass cfg.url() as first parameter to Slice. Also to fix the proof you need to change path: "/npm_repo/" to url: http://localhost:8080/npm_repo in npm_repo.yaml
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -167,7 +169,7 @@ static Slice build(
                 break;
             case "npm":
                 slice = new NpmSlice(
-                    cfg.path(),
+                    new Unchecked<>(() -> new URL(cfg.path())).value(),
